mapper.select: SELECT REPORT_NO AS reportNo , USER_NO AS userNo , TITLE AS title , CONTENT AS content , CREATE_DATE AS createDate , COUNT FROM CP_REPORT r JOIN CP_USER u ON u.USER_NO = r.USER_NO JOIN CP_POINT p ON p.USER_NO = r.USER_NO WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 'Y' ORDER BY REPORT_NO DESC , POINT DESC , USER_LEVEL DESC
